Interface needs some love I just downloaded this app. Ive never used Eventbrite before and i was curious. The first thing that asks is for the email "that I used to place my order". Nothing else, no welcome, hi you doing, thanks for downloading this app, or at least a link to "new members sign here", nothing. Just a blank space, asking for my email that I used for the order I never placed. I put my email anyway, that was pretty stupid of me since I don't know nothing about this service or app. I knew that if my email wasn't recognized it will prompt me to sign up. Every app out there does that. Is basic app design 101. Not for Eventbrite. WHAT? That's right. It won't let me access anything beyond asking for the email of the order I never placed. I just hope their offices are not Nigeria. I'm not signing up for this until I find more about it.

Love. This app is amazing. I'm not a huge event goer because the process used to be so complicated. Now when someone tweets an event I look it up in the Eventbrite app and within seconds I have bought my ticket. I also don't have to be worrying about printing out tickets and other archaic activities, I just show my phone at the door. I've definitely bought more tickets because of the "events around me" feature. It makes finding, purchasing, and going to events so much easier. Thanks, great product.
Event Creation This app needs to allow users to create new events. Until this feature is added, it has very limited functionality.
Yawn I don't see what all the fuss is about. The app didn't help me find one single event of interest to me.

Atrocious customer "service" For whatever this app may or may not be worth, the fact remains that Eventbrite has consistently ignored repeated reports of glaring lapses in their website and/or email communications lacking crucial date, time and place specifics for many events. For NO other reason than they simply can't be bothered to change some completely arbitrary layouts which often as not cut off said information when there is absolutely NO reason whatsoever to impose ANY restrictions in such digital space. Worse still, their reps have actually had the nerve to blame their OWN paying customers (i.e., event sponsors) for "not complying with their formatted fields" which were INadequately set by the company in the first place. And ALL this business is about comes down to Information Technology!

Caution - Fraud Potential The app works well, however I‚Äôve discovered that you are taking a big risk purchasing tickets through Eventbrite. We recently discovered that even though Eventbrite accepts payments on behalf of event promoters, they deny any responsibility towards providing refunds if the event promoter fails to honor the tickets they‚Äôve sold. In our case we had prepaid tickets for a 300 person event in San Francisco. When we arrived we were told that the promoter had oversold the event and no additional guests would be allowed in. Then the promoter came out and told the crowd that he‚Äôd decided to sell higher priced tickets at the door and if we had wanted to get into the event, we should have arrived earlier. And since in his view it was our fault that we could not attend the event, he would not be offering any refunds. There were at least 50 advanced ticket holders still outside the venue when we finally left. I‚Äôve contacted Eventbrite but have not received a response. Caveat emptor.

Excellent integration and support! This system just works. I visited the website of an event I wanted to attend and clicked on their Eventbrite link. First time account setup was painless, the app installed without problem, my event showed up on the upcoming tab, and the ticket was added to passbook.

Great What a Great app I planned the whole trip to Denver and I have all my events and my Passbook except one which is a bus to one of the two concerts I will be attending that weekend and I would've never known about the bus without this app. Like the Paypal option. Very easy to transfer dates and times of your events directly into your calendar... So I give it two thumbs up five stars much love and I really appreciate Eventbrite. This app has been needed for a while and I plan on checking things locally too but it made my out of town events a breeze and expect it to make future shows easy and help keep you current on events....

Great, buuuut.. This app is perfect and easy to use. The only thing I wish that I could change about it is when I order tickets (and say forget a person or I can only order two at time but have three people going and I have to order more) they don't get grouped together. Then I'm stuck in line going, "Wait.. wait.. I've got one.. more.. somewh-.. DAMNIT, where is it?! Yes! It's this one! Oh.. you already scanned this one.. Okay, give me a minute.." Let me tell you, SXSW is going to be a PAIN trying to get everyone in at the same time.

E V E N T B R I T E Keeping this short and to the point, this app is AMAZING. Even despite the one or two instances in which the app didn't refresh quick enough (but this is the case with numerous apps - so, really it's no deal breaker) or wouldn't allow me to purchase a ticket (which was a bit annoying only because I had to result to using my laptop #millennialproblems - again, not a deal breaker), I've, for the most part, haven't come into any serious road blocks with this app. It's easy to use and a great way to find out about local events occurring in or around your city. Truly, a great app all around.

Awesome I am very impressed by this app. Wow! It shows a map, so you can get driving, bus or walking directions, it shows your ticket for ticket scanning, all your past and upcoming events, the event page, and allows you to contact the organizer. Very well thought out app. As for those who didn't rate it high, they did not understand that this App is for attendees, not the event organizer. There's a different app for the organizer. And as far as not having the password, just hit "Forgot my password." This is super good.
Simple App with enormous potential. I'm giving this App a 3 star rating because it does what they say it will do but it doesn't get a higher rating because it could do so much more.

More support than a wonder bra! The app is simple and it works. That is a large part of what Eventbrite's business is about. Make registering simple and easy. I also coordinate triathlons in my neck of the woods and recently started using Eventbrite for our race registration. Everything is intuitive, but in case you need help they have people available 24/7 to support you. That part of eventbrite is invaluable for a registrant as well as an event coordinator.  My best experience with online registration to date.

Love it! I never write reviews because I feel it is very time consuming and boring. However, I have to write this one because Eventbrite is my favorite app! üíú I love that I can find all types of events (huge, small, parties, art, etc) in just one website. It is easy to pay for events, although I enjoy the free ones the most. Love how easy they are to search. If I could change one thing is that sometimes in the phone app I can't see the events that I have saved. But this is not a big deal. LOVE IT!!!

Great App! I give this a 5-star rating because it serves my needs. And I would like it even better if I could limit searches by geographical areas. For example, I would like to limit search results to events only in New Jersey. This would provide exactly the results I want and omit results that I do not want, for example events in Philadelphia. I hate to sound petty, and this is probably only a minor inconvenience. But an enhancement like this would make the app even better. Despite this, I like the app very much.

Ok, but needs work... I think this app could be really great but at this point, it's just average. I do like how I can create the events in my calendar for easy reminders and typically don't ever have to print a physical ticket out which is awesome... The search function however, could stand a huge amount of improvement. I would really like to be able to search multiple areas of events versus only one at a time... It would also be amazing to have categories, ex. Music, Food, Food and Music, Networking, etc....please make some updates Eventbrite. So little could make this app so much better!!!

No Ticket Reserve as you enter CC info I was very disappointed in my experience with this ticket purchasing platform. I had logged in for an event, and as soon as the tickets became available I clicked through. I had entered my CC info, and ALL of the additional information requested. As I clicked to submit my purchase, I was told tickets were unavailable. Eventually the status changed to 'sold out'. I already had requested 2 tickets and entered my information. I do not understand how the tickets I am currently purchasing can be sold to other people!  Definitely a flaw in the set-up. I am very disappointed to be missing a great experience due to this site, and do not recommend for other events to use.

Nice app, has bug though Like it, but app has a bug.  I was able to create an Eventbrite account without problem. I created the account because I wanted to be able to save favorite events.  At first everything was working, I saved a list of 12 events that I was interested in.  Then after searching and finding the 13 event of interest, then adding it, it saved but the previously added 12 events were lost.  I searched on my first topic, and from that resultset I saved 12 events without problem.  Then I searched on my second topic, and added 1 from that resultset, it was at that time that the previously added 12 were lost.
Best thing for concerts since the microphone This app is killer. I use it on an iPhone and it's always a stellar experience. Makes keeping up with tickets a non issue.

Update is a big step backwards, STILL. In the old version, when viewing a list of events, you could read the whole event title. Now it's just a few words, and not enough to know what the event is about. So now browsing events on the iPhone is much harder and not worth the effort. They're making the same mistake that the iTunes App Store has been making forever on the iPhone. Why would I tap on an app or an event when the title is so truncated that it reveals almost nothing about the app or event?

I like keeping events in one place This app is good but for as long as I've had it, the same glitch keeps occurring. The notifications keep popping up on my screen, despite turning off all of the notifications in my iPhone setting.

ALMOST perfect but... everytime im searching for events under a category and register for it, the appl takes me back to my 'home page' which lists the events i'm going to. i wish it went back to the same section i was viewing before buying the tickets. its a hassle to go back to category and scroll all the way down to where i left off. (perhaps you guys can fix this on an update?) besides that, this is a really convenient app to have!

Terrible This app used to be great. The update and redesign blasts my eyes with screen brightness and it keeps my screen this way. I even called them to report it and nothing has been done. Lease go back to the previous way of handling the screen brightness which was unobtrusive. I will delete until they make this important change. No app should take over the screen brightness without permission. This is obtrusive and irritating. I understand the need to brightness me for the ticket reader.  Whatever this is the only time the screen should be really bright. When I go back to the list of events it should dim like it used to before the update

Missing most important feature for a phone app The most important thing to have on your phone is a reminder of things you're interested in: those you've  bookmarked or bought tickets for.  Everything else you can just as easily do on a computer, but getting reminders needs to be with you wherever you are.   Bookmarks should result in reminders a week and then a day before, and buying tickets should result in a day and then an hour before, or be configurable.

Good app The app and what it provides is amazing for entrepreneurs! It's a must have. My biggest issue this the app (hints the 3 stars) is that every time I log in it create a whole new acct for me and all of my data that was loaded within the other about is completely gone. There is no "oh this acct doesn't exist" or "did you forget you password".... It just creates a completely new acctüò£! I find that to be the most insane way of having a membership base site. There is no security from what it looks like.  I really hope you guys change this feature all together. Thanks.

First time using this app; no issues so far This is the first time I used Eventbrite as an app and so far I haven't had any problems. The reason I started using the app is b/c someone who I work with recommended it; also I didn't know there was another method of downloading tickets besides going online and it is much easier to use than having tickets on paper! I like it and I hope to continue using it whenever there will be an event üòÑ.

Best event app, a little more organized with lists of events I love this app because I can always look for events and parties to go to in the city. I also love that I can not only purchase my ticket on this app but the ticket saves on my phone so I don't have to deal with finding a printer to print out my ticket or trying to open up my email . I do wish they had events in a category so I don't have to look through a whole bunch of different events, but it's a good app!

Great app!! Coming from someone who goes to many nightculture and discodonnie events, this app makes my life so easy! In just a couple clicks I can find and pay for tickets to events I want to go to then simply pull up the tickets on my phone. And since I just need to log into the eventbrite app to access the tickets, I can pull them up on any phone! (And I let my phone die all the time so this really helps!)

Amazing!!!!! Must get and download right NOW!!!! What are you waiting for ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ Looking for something to do, Eventbrite is the app to use!!! Have never had any issues using the app and so far I love all the free activities. Child friendly, family oriented and great for just hanging out with friends. LOVE it!!! I can always find something to do and most events are FREE, nothing beats that!! Must get and download right NOW!!!! What are you waiting for ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

Scammer's playground I will never purchase tickets from here again. Bought tickets to a yacht party for my friend's birthday while we were in Miami. After waiting an hour we had to contact the event promoter and were informed the party bus (that was taking us to the yacht) broke down and we would be refunded our money. I was given the run around and finally was told it could take up to 4days for my money to be back in my account. It has now been 3weeks since I was told that and no one is responding back. Also, I don't think things should be deleted off my profile unless I delete them. I came back here to see if there was anymore info on the promoter and the event was deleted.

Excellent idea-app This app is not only an excellent means of searching, registering, and checking in for events, but it is an excellent idea app. If you are the type of person that does the same old thing when going out, download this app and search for something new to do in your area.

Excellent idea-app This app is not only an excellent means of searching, registering, and checking in for events, but it is an excellent idea app. If you are the type of person that does the same old thing when going out, download this app and search for something new to do in your area.

Works, but the my tickets area needs work The app is cool. It's functional, but the area that is probably used the most needs work. The My Tickets area doesn't have an Update mechanism. So if you're buying the ticket online, through your computer, and you go to the app, the ticket is not immediately there. That doesn't instill confidence. Later on, it finally shows up.

Encourages getting out & living! For those of us that enjoy activities, learning, face-to-face networking, and getting out of the house, this app is a convenient tool for exploring community events. It's even helpful when trying to find interesting things to do in a city/area you may be visiting. More businesses, organizations, churches, groups, etc. need to jump on board! A big thanks to the creators and developers of this awesome app!

Very poor.. Full if promise then bad delivery This app appears promising but has a useless interface. Once you allow it to 'know your location' it's impossible to turn off that feature. You would think events would be organized by Date, but they are not - who decided that does obviously not know how to keep an event diary.

Frustrating I know app developers have a tough job. However I think this is another example of the only game in town being a poor game. I have used this app as an adjunct with and through other apps. Eventbrite performs poor to okay. It is spotty in how well it does and what details of your account it remembers. Right now I have a ticket that I can get to/view via their site, but not through the app on mobile. Additionally connection thru other apps or events can be very problematic and brings into question the stability of Eventbrite data and backend dev.
Won't stay logged in Before the latest version, things seemed to be ok. Not the best app to use, not near the worst, either. I'm typically using to check up on the events I administer.

Out of control The idea of this app is good but management is bad. Examples today looking at local events and first thing that popped up was let us say was very close to pornographic picture for some event. Something me nor my spouse would want to see. Or any family member. Secondary you can't don't see ticket numbers on passboard that came on the pdf. You cannot search on the ticket numbers nor transfer to another email account. As you would want if you giving as a gift or changing providers. Help is lacking so much. This could be a great app but not yet

More tickets than seats Even though I had a ticket, the building was to capacity and the doors were locked. I understand this was a free event, but why waste my time to register for a ticket and go to an event only to be turned away.

Does not show invitations I attend events for which I receive invitations (emails sent by Eventbrite), yet these invitations never show up in the app itself, which is logged on using the exact same email address to which I receive the invitations. So each time I have to go to the PC, open the email, register with the web form, and only then does the event show in the app. Even opening the invitation email in Gmail on iOS doesn't link to the app. Fix this (view and accept invites within the app), and I will give it a five-star rating for time saved instead of wasted.

This app keeps me organized! So happy they made an app for attendees. I go to a lot of events and plan them as well. This app keeps all of my tickets organized in one place so I don't have to print. Love the new feature where you can find events going on near you as well. Huge fan of their entry app that I use to check guests in during my events too!

Great app great site I recently helped run a fundraiser and used eventbrite. We created the event on the site and used the apps "entry," and "at the door." These all were unbelievably easy to use and helped so much with check in and selling tickets at the door. It made our event easier to run and to keep track of the number of attendees and money taken in. The organization with the site and apps is amazing.

Easy to use with just enough info needed Easily understood application which provides just enough information needed for an event. Better than other applications than can overload folks with tons of information. Leave some details to be discovered at the event as oppose to trying to find everything over the internet; it's a buzz kill at times. Satisfied with the features overall.

Brilliant! Eventbrite has helped my business referral network expand quickly. As the president of an in home personal training company we have expanded rapidly and were having difficulty finding prospective clients in new areas.
Good but why do I need Facebook to fully use First off, great app; easy to find things and use. Pretty impressive scope of events in this area listed.

Issues seem to have been fixed I was skeptical downloading the app but everything worked out very smoothly. I just entered my login details and the app picked up the reservation I had made online. It also allowed me to save the tickets to Passbook. It's also shows all event taking place during the weekend in you area. That's all I could ask for!!!

Cool, but could be better I love eventbrite! I just got this app a few minutes ago and it works pretty well, I would like to see the registrants notification come to the app and not my email because it gets lost pretty easily...and possibly be able to build an event on the app, or be able to send the email invites through it that way I don't have to bring my laptop everywhere I could just use my phone or IPad.

App but even close to using the CPU version I used eventbrite for a ticketed workshop o found the website version easy to use and lots of function.  The app does not allow enough controls for organizers to effectively manage their events from their smart device.  Added features such as guest list editing, wait list or even the ability to edit your event would be greAt.  For now it just allows you to monitor (watch) ticket sales and see an attendee list. I think there is a ton of function that could be put in the app for event organizers then I would use it exclusively for all my ticket sales!

Suggestions As an active user frequently seeking for valuable events in a relatively fixed location, I sincerely wish the app could add a functionality for users to bookmark/save event organizers, for high quality organizers can always hold attractive events, yet for several occasions I missed them. And the email latent factor recommendation algorithm needs some serious remodeling.

Fairly decent when the app corporates When searching for a particular venue/show, the app often does not pull up the event. I have better luck purchasing these events by logging on a computer for these particular venues/shows ( yes I have used the filters to help). But for music festivals I can generally find them quick & easy to purchase.

Does what it says and does it well With this app you can not register for new events. You can only look at upcoming and past events you've registered for, share the event, and map out the event location. That's what the description says the app does, and it performs well on my iPhone 4S. Read description of app before writing bad reviews.

Yes, Thank You! A great app that even lists events in remote areas!  Many "social" apps promise connection, but only work for large cities or metropolitan areas, sometimes over 100 miles away.  If it is under a certain population density the search doesn't even work.  Eventbright shows the events that local sponsors list with them! Thank You!

Nice but Limited It's cool that you can see what events are going on in the area and the price (if any) at quick glance. What I wish it had was a feature where if you're the organizer, you can see those details (who and how many people have signed up for an event, etc.). The only way I can do that now is if I sign in online.

Simply the best I've used Eventbrite as a producer and as a consumer and have found their entire platform best in class. From customer service to product development and ease if use, there's simply nobody better. I have no financial interest in the company whatsoever, I just want great companies to get noticed and used by as many as possible. Eventbrite = better events.

Great app with fast load time Eventbrite is creating some great stuff. This app compliments dozens of other features and integrations built in to the website. The app doesn't offer all of the information available online (like a remaining ticket count) but works beautifully on the go. It gets four stars in my book for easy of use, fast load times, and clean design.

Best Event App Eventbrite is my favorite event app; I've been RSVPing to many, many SXSW events via the Eventbrite website and accessing my tickets via the app. The website and the app are both well designed and easy to use, and I love the option to download tickets to the iPhone Passbook for easy access even without an Internet connection. Thank you, Eventbrite!

Fast, Easy, Convenient I've used Eventbrite for several different kinds of events and in different cities. No problems saving tickets, putting them in passbook, or using them at events. So convenient not to have paper. Have not seen any of the problems some others have recorded. Using 6 plus.

Eventbrite I and others are using this app on a PC to schedule club events alongside the smart phone apps. It is fairly easy to use, but in my opinion the overall interface could use a overhaul. Use it you won't be disappointed when creating free or paid events for your club or organization.

Great Event Finder You can sign up for events without being spammed afterward. The categories are very useful for finding events specific to an industry or career field. I also appreciate that many events list a POC, should you need to reach out about anything. I do think this app could be hit or miss depending on where you live. This app is useless if there isn't a high  enough concentration of users in your area.

PLEASE PLEASE ADD A CALENDAR FEATURE!!! I love Eventbrite, but it blows my mind that an app who's sole purpose is to schedule events, doesn't have its own calendar within the app. I like that I can view event's in my default calendar, but it would be super helpful to view and search for Eventbrite events in a calendar layout. Sometimes I'm looking for events on a specific day, and I can't do that through the app. If this feature was added, it'd definitely be a 5 star app!
Works well, with some mistakes Do you really need to remind me that you're increasing my brightness whenever I view a mobile ticket? No. At least build in some options with one to turn the popup off.

Solid, well designed app Though there occasional glitches updating the "My Tickets" section, overall this is a speedy, solid app for both managing your tickets to eventbrite events, and for finding new events near you. Passbook integration, while I haven't found it any more useful than just using the Eventbrite "view my ticket" option, is still a nice touch. Well done!

Great idea but... This app works perfectly when you want to be informed of new events around you. I love that you can purchase tickets or register for events within the app, but I wish there was a "favorites" option  where I can scroll and fave the events I may be interested in later and maybe more notification options, like "remind me about this event on..."

Easy Peasy to use I'm by no means tech savvy but this app is so easy to use, you don't need to be. It is so nice to use this rather than having to mess with printing out your tickets, it event let's you import your passport on your iPhone, that way you have it in two places, just in case. Which is good because sometimes this app lags, hence the reason why I didn't give a 5*

It works for me. I have used the app a few times. It allows me to easily purchase tickets, which I leave on my phone, then show, and gain entry. It also must provide info to the seller in that they expect me. Easy  payment with registered card. And it provides a search feature for events

Would be good if I could buy tickets again later I've had this situation a couple times, where I buy a ticket but end up needing to get one for a friend later but can't make more than one purchase for a show. It would be great if I could purchase tickets more than once for a show! Other than that I like the app a ton!

Great Event Organizing and Registration Tool I have used this app for the last couple few years to register for events and create some of my own. It has always worked well and I like the passbook feature that allows saving of tickets on a smartphone. You can also print lists of event registrants.

Poor search/filter function, but it's ok First, I love that there is a place where I can find things to do all in one place. This app, however, really needs to be updated with a feature on the main screen that allows us to choose a date and distance at the same time for ALL events. No one wants to go through each category to see what's happening today within 30 miles if their location. Please update and I will update this review. Thanks in advance!

Easy to buy, store and use tickets to events! I have used this app to purchase tickets and then it keeps your tickets on your phone until you need to present them for entry to an evert. One of the best features is it will simultaneously store the event info in your calendar on your phone, which is a feature I love! Great app! I <3 it!

Easy to use, find and sign up for events Love the website and app, which are separate entities, but work in tandem helping you use, find, and sign up for events. Love the function to see who's going from your social media, which also allows you to link up & attend events with friends!
Worked great for me, and it's free A lot of whining in the emails below for a free app.  You'd think it cost them something!

Wow Really useful. I found a bunch of networking events I wasn't aware of. Super simple to sign-up and passbook integration is seamless. It would be nice to have an add-to-calendar feature, either in the app or in passbook. I didn't look hard for this so maybe it's there... Not removing stars because I'm not sure. Great app.
Make it update; shortcut to passbook Ideally this would update 'my tickets' automatically at startup; also on demand. I can do this painfully by logging out and back in.

More filters needed! This app is useless to me in Miami... There are so many events happening all the time, especially night life stuff/party stuff, it's hard to find anything else. There should be meta tags and filters to search for specific types of events or even by times.

Convenient, saves time, and saves paper! I attend a lot of events that use Eventbrite. Being able to keep all my tickets in one place is a huge plus! I've also started finding a lot more interesting events around me due to this app. Definitely check it out!

A great app to share!!! People love attending events, and getting into the social circle. This is great to find great events in your area. The more you share event dates and times the higher chance for attendance. It's a win win if vendors can also attend. Both people and business can get excited about this!!

Overall Good I like the app very much. I organize events and it's easy to access all of them. The only thing that doesn't work for me is the scanner. It scans one ticket then doesn't work on any others unless I close the scanner and reopen it after every ticket. Makes it cumbersome to check multiple people in. This feature used to work perfectly but not so much anymore.

Love it I'm new to my town and this is the best way for me to get involved. They show all of the events that are going on in the city with a description, how far away it is and the time. I've only had the app for a few weeks but have booked a ton of stuff through it.

Where are my tickets? I've used this app for a few years now. But I just purchased tickets for two events, and they are not showing up in my events. I've gone back to the confirmation emails several times, opened the app, signed in, followed all the trouble shooting instructions, and nothing! I don't want to use paper print outs, but it seems I have no choice. How can an app that used to work so well, suddenly become downgraded. This us not cool!

Works well most of the time The app is functional. However, there was one time when I could not register for an event, as I ran into the maximum registration error without ever registering for it. Otherwise, I like the interface and the ability to add events to my calendar which saves me quite a bit of effort over time.

Great app, extremely under rated I bought my ticket for governors ball online and was a but skeptical about having an app on my phone be my ticket, but there was not a single problem my account was easily accessible and basically I don't get why there's so many haters of this app, I say f off ha

Essential for Events This app is easy and essential - especially for people that go to, or seek out events to attend often. It keeps all my tickets in one place, and is smart about suggesting other relevant events that may be of interest to me. The Passbook integration is an extra bonus and sweeeeeet.

Love this app Best app ever!! Bad reviews stating that is hard to navigate? That person is either dumb or not familiar with search engines off course you will have to do some work to find what you want but overall I would most likely recommend this app to anyone

Great platform, App needs improvements Eventbrite is an amazing product. It would be great to have the ability to access personal information on the mobile app and create new events too. As far as showing tickets on Passbook, it would be great to have a default option.

Good easy app Have joined two different events using Eventbrite and have had a seamless operating experience each time. I added the latest event to my calendar and was able to download the tickets directly to my phone which is very convenient.

Like it but I really dig this app a lot, it connects to passbook which is amazing- only problem is that it won't let me add the event to my calendar- the button/link doesn't work and its pretty frustrating. Other than that I have no problems :)

Has great potential A great app if you want to know what events are happening when and where. The only thing keeping me from rating 5 stars is that it needs an easier way to add tickets to passbook. I had to open my email and copy the link I got and paste it in my chrome app. Other than that, a very good app.

Can't create an event in the app? Dumb Why on earth would you have an event app, but not allow people to create an event in the app? That's just dumb. To have to physically go into the full website for eventbrite to do this is an unnecessary step. My primary use for the app is creating events for my organization. That was the only reason i downloaded the app because I thought I would be able to easily create events in the app. WRONG! Please get a clue and add this feature.

Not too shabby I am a first time user, so I don't have a lot to say at this point other than it is pretty cool. I like what I see, the concept is great and it saves me from having to carry paper. I would have given it 5 stars instead of 4 but I wish to reserve my opinion until I have logged a few miles with it üòÄ

Why would you not get this app? There is really no reason. If people have a problem they should contact customer service not post here. This app makes life easier not just events. Keep the updates coming!

Totally useful Not only can I just use my phone as my ticket to the event, I also don't need to use multiple apps to get there. I tap on the event, tap on the map and voila!  It takes me to my maps and I can then get immediate directions without ever typing a word. Bravo!
Convenient and simple This has made my concert going experience so much easier.

Great ... But! I think the application is great, easy to use, and very useful :) but I recently encountered something that I think should be taken into account. Multiple emails on one account ... Many people have multiple emails and it would be really convenient if Eventbrite allowed multiple email accounts :D

So easy to find events This app is great for finding all kinds of events in town. User friendly interface, easy to use and has all your tickets organized. You don't even have to print your ticket, it's in your phone. I love it!!!

Finally Connects to server It would not connect to the Eventbrite server for several hours, when the wifi internet connection was working fine for everything else on the iPhone 4 and a mixed bunch of computers. I tried one last time before writing a scathing review but wonder of wonders it connected and downloaded the ticket I wanted just fine, as claimed.

Easy as pie! I've used this app for ordering tickets to 2 separate events. It's easy to maneuver and then you have the tickets right there on the app so you don't have to worry about forgetting your event tickets. I'd highly recommend using this app to order tickets!

Useless app I downloaded this for the 2nd time, despite having major trouble with it a year ago. I paid through PayPal, got an email link, signed in over and over again only to get varying fail messages over and over again. After wasting too much time, I we to computer mail, got the link , and printed the tickets. I will try to avoid buying anything in the future that involves this aggravating app. They have had way too much time to fix problems.

Simple and Convenient This app allows a quick 5 minute registration for every rally I've attended, and provides the tickets right to my watch to be scanned when I arrive. I also receive emails when he returns to my area, ensuring I don't miss a single event

App not useful The app doesn't have basic filters so you can organize it by date you want to search the events. There are only a few options - the city, the type of event, what's this weekend, recommended and popular. If I want to find all the events going on on Tuesday evening - it is impossible to search.  Popular/recommended have many different dates and I can't get the info I am looking for. Useless app, I always go to the website instead.

Informed me when there was a slot available on a full event. I love that it informs you when there's an available slot on a full event that you like. But I couldn't comment on people using credit cards because I attend the free ones. Based on my experience, this app is awesome.

Finding Events It's great for looking at events you have booked already through their website, but searching for events is a mess. Manually entering a location doesn't work, so you can't use it to find events in a different city than the one you are currently in. And there so little sorting, so if you're in say NYC where 10k events come up on one night, there's no way to narrow down your event browsing.

Easy, fast and useful! Keeps all your events, may it be important or not in one place! Log in with your Facebook account and bam! You can see all the events near you! With just one tap, you can register without a sweat. And of course, Passbook integration is just SWEET!

Need a social life??? Well this app can make a flaccid social life pop and take a stand to rid those social whoas you've been feeling. Ok, if you don't get my drift than here's the short end ... It will place you at potential locations to get you laid. Check it out!

Huge step up Eventbrite has been around for many years now and this App is just a huge step up for them. Love that I can have QR codes for my events stored in one place, keep track of my schedule and invite friends. Good work!

Useful as they come I use this app all the time .. I get the convenience of being able to purchase the night they release and ease of access upon entering the venues. Only downside is some of the surcharges for ordering online can get stupid especially if you're buying more than one ticket...~~JK~~

Excellent App - Easy to use This app is super to work with and is compatible with many of the built in apps already set up with Apple products. It even offers additional event options no matter where you are in the world! Great stuff! Thanks!

Appreciate the update I like that I don't have to print out tickets anymore but was annoyed of having to sign in. NOW, I just signed up for an event and was expecting to sign in, and there was no need too. It recognized who I was and bam! Tickets are ready for me! Thank. You.

Why can't I have more than 1 email address? As far as event management apps go, I'm sure it's fine. Frankly, I attend events, I don't plan them. Sometimes I attend professional events, sometimes I attend personal events. Do I really have to use the same email address for both? Odd. The message boards are full of similar comments, so I don't think I'm missing something...

Eh Doesn't save the events I choose to save. Doesn't link up to my saved event in FB even though I'm logged in on the app.  Doesn't show my tickets purchased without having to log in constantly.  Doesn't show all events in my area that I know are posted through eventbrite.  Doesn't show an event when I search by exact name after I've saved it on FB and try to purchase tickets via the app.  UGH!

Very useful app Very handy. Easily locates activities and events. Makes finding activities/events and purchasing tickets to events simple. I had issues with previous editions but they have definitely worked out the kinks.

Truly digital tickets Having all my tickets in one place AND having them pop up at the appropriate time makes entry into events so much easier! Great for the environment too‚Äîno more printing an email just to toss it after I enter an event.

Truly digital tickets Having all my tickets in one place AND having them pop up at the appropriate time makes entry into events so much easier! Great for the environment too‚Äîno more printing an email just to toss it after I enter an event.
Simple, clean and useful Great app! Keeps all my tickets in one place. I can check what's coming up, and quickly figure out how to get there, with the link to maps.

Love it! Used Eventbrite for 3 different events. Very convenient; prefer it over paper tickets. Used customer service to apply a discount after I had purchased a ticket, and was extremely satisfied with the outcome and response and time.

Fantastic!!!!!! I didn't realized there are so many events going on around my area before using this app. I love is because it is beautifully designed, easy to use, and it can add any ticket to passbook which is my favorite!
Great apps for business events Eventbrite makes sign up easy and brings tickets

Great app A really useful app for keeping my tickets to events in one place, and not having to print out paper tickets; plus I like the feature of being able to use eventbrite for my own events, like distributingy next business strategy...inviting a select audience...useful!!

Technology Integrationist I've been using eventbrite for the past couple of years,  and I am so pleased with how easily it functions on all of my devices. I only wish I could use it for every kind of ticket I have to hold onto.

Problem with this app After wasting almost 40 minutes trying to login and resetting my password on this app I finally went to my computer to log into eventbrite so that I could find some tickets I purchased. Logging in on the computer I could find the tickets but not through this app. I thought the reason why we had abs on our cell phones or for situations such as this. Unfortunately it does not work.

Best app to stay up to date on local events Best app to stay up to date on local events such as concerts, festivals, and shows. They have the right filters to make it easy to search by city and dates. Really useful when traveling to a new city and looking for things to do.

Love love I have been strictly using the website for eventbrite but I am always on the move. I was offered this app and tried I on a whim and I LOVE it! It moves quickly, it's easy to understand and I will no longer go without it :)

A whole new world of opportunities! Totally awesome way to advertise events and cool way for people like me to see what cool events I can go to.  I'd have no idea of how many seminars, races, speakers, etc are in my area without this.  Already wanna go to like two events a week!
Simple and convenient I love how you can have your tickets scanned right from your phone! Also love the option to be able to add the event to my calendar with just one click!

Great app! I just started my own business about six months ago and so far Eventbrite has been wonderful. I use it to look for opportunities to increase my knowledge into network and it has not let me down.
Super easy to use!! It is super easy to use. You just create an account, find events you want to go to or are going to, then save them to your account. No need to hunt down info on them again.

Good, but.. For the most part the app works pretty well. The location services doesn't work though when you have the setting for the app on phone set to "while using." It only works when location services are set to always on. Just a little bug that needs to be fixed.

Convenient! Great I use it all the time if your a person that loves going to clubs/events this great to RSVP and get special deals. Plus you don't have to go out and buy your tickets you can get it with a touch of a button.
Why does the app change iOS brightness? I have my brightness settings set so I can save power. When viewing details on an event, the app changes the settings to max. Not a fan of this behavior.

Fave Great app to look up local (or any specific city) events in your area and sign up easily without using other websites to pay (if needed). Also probably a good way for businesses to set up events as well.

Works Great! I've never encountered difficulties. Ticket ordering and access is very straightforward. Many apps like this are not worth downloading because just a webpage would suffice.  Eventbrite actually makes it easier. I like it.

Great App I received an Eventbrite Invitation to an upcoming event.  The confirming email from Eventbrite said that this app can be used to store my tickets rather than my having to print and bring my tickets.  I d/l'd the app, logged in, and presto - there are my tickets.  Great app!!
Great App Good tool to explore fun events in the city. I especially like that all tickets go directly to Passbook, and I can also easily add events to my calendar.

Love it It's such an easier way to present and keep up with events. I love the fact that I can just show my invite  on my phone instead of having to go thru my bag for a piece of paper. Try it you'll love it....

Solid Eventbrite is the easiest and most accurate method of keeping track of event registration and ticketing around. As soon as you complete your purchase, it's available for review and printing. I highly recommend Eventbrite!

Doesn't work. The app is fine until you click on my tickets. It asks you to type in your email address to send them to you, but when you check your email it is just an email to reset your password. I thought I had made an error and tried the process again, but am still not able to pull up the tickets. Just getting  reset password email.... Frustrating.

This App is Wonderful üåü I would give this app ten stars if I could. I went to several different events and had a wonderful time! Almost all of them were free, too! What beats that?! Nothing! Try it, go places, and have fun!

ZERO Stars It's 36 out and I'm up and out the door at 7:20 to attend an Eventbrite hosted run.  I received a confirmation email on Thurs about the sched 5k for this morning.  No one arrived and although having sent an email inquiry to the event contact yes afternoon and then Frantic emails this morning as I tried to get in touch with anyone who might know what was going on.  Why did I get  reminder for an event that no longer existed. I blame Eventbrite and the Renegades 2015 promoters for loss of $$$ and of My Time!!!
Great app events, hard to locate the event location. Everything is great, but location feature need more work.
WORKED SO WELL I went to Boston Calling and bought four tickets throughout the week leading up to it and it automatically loaded onto my phone and I had no problem getting in.
Easy to use I sign up for runs and other fundraising events using this app. I like the convenience of having a reminder pop up plus I don't have to worry about printing a ticket.

Excellent app, minor tweaks needed! App is excellent, but come on... Let me add more than one email address to an account... I've got like ten of them and eventbrite makes it very difficult to get everything under control!

Can't dismiss reminder notifications I love the app and how it's formatted but I'm beginning to take issues with the constant bombardment of reminders that cannot be dismissed. It would be helpful to add a dismiss button to the add and if one already exist, it would be helpful to make it easy to locate for new app users such as myself.

Fantastic app!  User-friendly I especially appreciate the 'contact event organizer' link.  I've had to use it a few times, and immediately got answers to my questions (depends on the event, of course).

Effective App The Eventbrite app works great for my purpose, storing and using my Eventbrite tickets. It is more convenient than finding an email or printing tickets. I don't have any other needs from it, so it's perfect and simple.
Very Good App I have used this several times now for various events, and I love that I can just show my phone at the admission gate and they can scan it.  It saves me from having to print a ticket.

Ok, but could be better A decent app for keeping track of events for which you have purchased tickets. But if you are running an event, it is of limited value. You can see who is coming, which is nice, but, for example, if you want to invite additional people by email, you can't.
Bring back the map! And distance limit too for Nearby while you are at it.

‚úåüèæÔ∏èüëçüèæ Love this "plan my entertainment" app! App is very easy to navigate.  Doesn't get any simpler than to make reservations and it be auto-added to your calendar.  One drawback...event planners...embrace technology!!!  Every event should be via electronic tix....more efficient!!

Primitive! This app is very primitive! It's more about the company advertisement than client's benefit. It doesn't even have a place to enter the order number or ticket number and look for the event that I just signed up for.

Awesome Get all your local events in one place, order tickets or sign up for free events. It's so cool!  Love my eventbrite!  I've never had problems with the app and is easy to figure out how to use. I recommend it for all ages!

Passbook integration rocks! We used Eventbrite to organize an event for our non-profit group and were impressed by the Passbook integration! It popped the ticket on our screen when we got near the venue!  Very nice feature.

Works Great except PayPal It's really simple and easy to use but still has all the features of Eventbrite online! Great app for my new iPhone. Only problem is I have to go to the website to check out with PayPal because in the app it tells me my password for PayPal is wrong but it works fine on the website.

Really disappointing I found the functions lacking (not much interaction with the event or hosts after registering, no changing RSVP!) and it overrode my notifications settings. In fact I got so irritated at the reminders EVERY FIVE MINUTES even though I have them turned off that I deleted the app! Guess what? A week later, after removing the app from my iPhone I'm still getting them! Epic fail.

Very convenient ! Even though I couldn't  find an event in app , I like this app . I bought a ticket online and it showed up in my app after . So , I don't need to print it out and worry about forgetting it . Love it !

Very useful I get many eventbrite invites from businesses I like, my company & other sources. It's an easy way to accept invitations and keep track of tickets to events that can go right into passbook.
Great, Simple to use, Quick I wish all my tickets could be purchased through this app, easy to use passbook feature also!
Easy like it should be This app is awesome. Very simple to pay and find tickets and the passbook feature is absolutely useful. Could not ask for more.
Best local event app I've been trying to find a way to get involved in local events and this app is perfect! It gives all kinds of details of events that Are usually paper flyers in one area

Very convenient! I love the convenience of the app and how you can register for several events quickly. Would love a way to archive event coordinators to see what other events they are hosting later on.
Great! ONE SUGGESTION Please make the arrangement of the home screen tiles customizable like in Flipboard (where you can hold one down to move it around).

Needs better search feature & accompanying iPad app! Search feature needs to be tweaked some and there needs to be an iPad version of this app!! With those problems fixed, I'd give it a full 5 stars. Still great app!

Ruined. Streamlined? How about "useless"? You guys killed all the good features. The discovery feature and it's categories is way too broad now. And the most helpful thing about precious versions was the ability to see what my friends were attending, which doesn't appear Ir is broken now (even though I have notifications on in settings).

Best event app yet! Not even joking this app is all actaully has events that actually interest people. From the Motorcross Glen Helen races to awesome stoner events this has them all. Don't like stoner and your an alcoholic? They even have events for you guys lol! Beer tasting! Cheers!

Very useful I use it every week to sign up for school events, ALWAYS forgot to sign up during lunch, so now I can do it at home with just a few clicks, the only thing I don't really like is that on tablets, it is either blurry or small.

So where's my ticket? I bought tickets on the web, and they emailed me a link. the link asks me if i want to download the app or print the tix. i say download the app. it does, then starts pestering me for info like location. i go back and click on email link. again app comes up with stupid questions. i'm glad i'm having this now instead of trying to hand my ticket to the guy at the door. Terrible.

Convenient but.... I like the mobile app however, I am trying to delete a free ticket. I found the explanation on how to do it on my iPad but, it seems, you can't use those instructions on the mobile app! Not very helpful.

Addresses... This is a great service but he interface between my calendar didn't work.  And you have GOT TO insist that those creating events put in an actual address.  I've had three events in recent months that the address wasn't included in the electronic invite.

A give app that delivers on most that it promises I like simple apps that don't exceed their scope. Sure, one could ask for an app that does more, but one might as well be asking for the online service, itself to do more. This one delivers on all fronts.
Check-in is so easy So easy as a host to check people in. So as easy as a guest to keep track of tickets. No more lost paper to worry about - as long as I don't lose my phone!

Worthless A group of friends and I downloaded the app because it said you could view the ticket on the app and skip the will call line. Had we known ahead of time that this app was completely useless for this, we would have planned accordingly.

Great service & app Been an Eventbrite user for years. Service is great. Like the iOS Passbook integration. Saw the complaint about the Outlook Calendar  integration - will have to check it for myself.

I would give it five stars IF I could snyc with my calendar & if I was able to chose more interests. I liked being able to see everything that was going on in my area. Now it's so filtered. Other than that eventbrite is amazing !!!‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è

Very good but could use work This app is very convenient and is great for setting up or going to an event. The only problem I have is in the search features, sometime when looking for an artist this app fails
Works Perfectly It lets you add tickets to Passbook/Wallet and Calendar. I've had no trouble using tickets directly from the app at a variety of events.
Great app! I've purchased many convention tickets through this app and never had an issue...  Works well and I love having the local suggestions area!
Lists ALL Events I love how you can customize events to those of your liking! This app has all of the events in the area listed! It's easy as pie to register and download tickets!
Works as expected Have been a users of this app for over three years.  It has always performed as it should.  Strongly recommend it to any new user.

Buzzed art I went to an eventbrite event called buzzed, and it was the worst experience I have ever had. The picture represented on the advertisement was another picture entirely. I was told that I could paint what I wanted, then the person told me I could not have any more paint. They were rude and unresponsive, and I will never attend an event with this person again. I'm only giving one star because I have to give a star to submit.

I won't purchase tickets here I won't be purchasing anything on this app again. My event was canceled due to a severe thunderstorm (it was an outdoor event) and I could not get a refund. I hadn't even entered the place so my ticket was never scanned. The event coordinator acted dumb and eventbrite doesn't step in, so buy at your own risk because your event might get canceled before you even arrive and no one will refund your money.
Great App!! Lots of events including lots of legitimate free ones especially when we're looking for some quality entertainment with our 2 year old.

Love this app! I just upgraded my iOS and went back to the App Store and downloaded EventBrite fresh again.  It works fine. Love the convenience and the interesting things I find to attend! Thanks, EventBrite.
Useless I type in an exact address and it gives me events in the entire area and not the 5+ shows I know are happening in that building.

Awesome I'm new to this app but have used it about 4 times. I love it. It simplifies the event ticketing process and allows to to organize and plan for upcoming shows, conferences etc. I highly recommend it.

Not designed for groups One shortcoming I've found is that if somebody else buys your ticket for you (e.g. social organizer for a company or a family member...), this app doesn't see the ticket at all, even though it's linked to your email address--which defeats the whole point of this app.
Could be better The concept is great. Not as user friendly as it could be. One change would be, the ability to connect with multiple calendars.

Use the Web Page, not the app The app is not easy to use if looking for an event you know about. It places too much emphasis on what is around you or discovering new things. The app lacks various features from the web site, either missing outright or they don't work. Eventbrite is a good service but the app brings it down.
A waste. It was much easier to print a pdf than to use this app.
Quick n Easy Quick n Easy ticket purchases.  Evenbrite is fully digital but also maintains the option to print your tickets. Love it.
Very nice! I like how you are able to easily search for items in the area as well as those surrounding! Quickly saves to the app and then to my wallet on my phone! Love iiiiiitttt!!!!!

Not designed for groups One shortcoming I've found is that if somebody else buys your ticket for you (e.g. social organizer for a company or a family member...), this app doesn't see the ticket at all, even though it's linked to your email address--which defeats the whole point of this app.

Good App I mostly use this app to buy tickets to EDM events in my area and the process has been smooth every time. My only gripe is that events that show up on the Eventbrite website do not always show up in the app.
Outstanding Extremely convenient and easy to use.  A huge jump from paper tickets.
Amazing App I just recently found out is was an app!! I've been missing out for a long time! It is a extremely useful and easy app. I love it and I use it constantly.

Easy to use app but could improve App gets the job done for me. Simple and seamless. It would be a great functionality to have a "transfer to another Eventbrite user" (similar to Ticketmaster). This would minimize duplicate use of tickets in the app. A developer who could do this would be great!

Needs work‚Äîpretty janky There's a lot of cruft here for ticket purchasers. The Discover tab seems like it's driven by the marketing department. Mobile tickets are disabled for nearly everything. And why does Eventbrite request access to my calendar when I try to add an event to it? That permission is only required if you're reading from the calendar‚Äîwhy would Eventbrite want to read my calendar?? Sketchy.
Great way to find events Great way to find things going on in your area or any area you're in. Easy way to search for events and a good variety of events.
Works great No need to print tickets just bring your phone they scan it that's it. I've had it for 2yrs now & I always prefer to buy tickets thru evenbrite
Supremely convenient How nice to be able to pull up tickets to an event just by opening the app and choosing them when you get there; great accessibility, big fan.
Digital tickets I buy tickets to local music events on here, never had an issue. The digital tickets are very useful, but the app needs better filtering when searching for events.

Lacking some key features It would be better if you could actually access the site thru the app to search and register for events. It also does not add the event to the iPhone calendar. You still have to manually enter the event.
Very convenient It is so great to have all your stuff in on place. Often you don't need to print or bring tickets if you have them in the app. Fabbolosso!

Paid twice!! Warning!! This app does not automatically sync with your account so if you purchase tickets on a different device, you must log out and back in to see your tickets in the app!! I could not find my ticket via the app last evening and had to pay again at the door for my event.
Don't pay attention to bad reviews! This app does EXACTLY what I would expect. It's perfect for the consumer end of ticketing. Very easy for all ages to understand when it comes to online ticketing.

Keeps closing The app keeps closing as I scroll through list of search results. After it happened several times in a row, I gave up checking out the app any further. Would have liked app of it worked properly. Needs fix ASAP.
Wow I ‚ù§Ô∏è it!! This app is so cool! It's super easy to use and way more convenient than having to print out my tickets for shows and events. Plus, it saves paper which is totally cool. Thanks!

Frustrating App & I work in QA Testing!! It's extremely annoying to register for an event and want to easily continue searching for more events to attend...where you left off. Nope! You have to start all over because there's no return to search results button or action menu. Disappointing process.

Great for online music tickets This app is great for music concerts. Get the tickets thru the app then show the app at the event to get in. Guaranteed space in advance no waiting in line day of event, links to calendar .
Easy digital tickets Makes keeping all my tickets organized a breeze and getting into events simple. Digital tickets are the best!
Grate App This app is grate, always easy to find events. And have your tickets email or saved to your phone. So you won't have to keep up with any paper. Love it..

Almost perfect... Great app! Works perfect for searching events and finding different activities! Would LOVE the next update to include selecting new events and viewing previously saved events through the app as well! Get that fifth star, Eventbrite!
Great app! Makes keeping track of my events simple and organized. Syncs well with the calendar to keep things running smoothly.
Never knew so many events existed This app is convenient and stores your ticket on your phone. No more paper tickets! I never knew so many great community events existed!
Easy to use I purchased VIP tickets quickly and easily. The tickets are stored in my account and easy to access on my iPhone. I'm really enjoying this app.
Crashing I don't know what changes have been made but the app crashes all the time . At this point I can't even open it .
Very convenient I love the fact that I already have my iPhone with me all the time so if I forget to bring a paper copy of a ticket, I have the app to save my bacon! üòä
Pretty good Good overall, one day took to a few incorrect places but besides that day everything was good, every ticket worked, and they even give you refunds if you make the wrong order.

Great for small town and big city happenings I found multiple things to do in my town and surrounding cities. There are a lot of free events, and I love how you can customize it to the categories you're into.
Works well... The events process through here is fine, no particular trouble...would be nice if app had an autofill option...
Perfect Worked perfectly! I can show people at the event that I purchased the tickets on my phone and avoid wasting paper.
Easy to use Used it for an event today. Loved not having to print tickets and it worked flawlessly.
Amazing app So easy to navigate, very quick and interactive and user friendly, beautiful design and very very helpful and easy to understand , well done.

Love it but..... The app is really a life saver but if you could somehow add a way to manager eventbrite from your phone without have the user have to go to his/her computer then that would really be great but besides that the app is wonderful.
Simple to use and keeps my events together Love it.
Great event management/ticketing service/app. There are variety events available covering all kinds of categories. The app is very easy to use. I really enjoy using it. Thank you!

I would like to give 4 or 5 stars but.. Events are not easily shown in order. A bit frustrating. It would be ideal as a default setting to see what's happening today, weekend, this month, next month, etc. Instead of Sept., June and then this weekend. Other than that I really like it so far
Love it! I love this ap. I can keep all my event and meeting tix in one spot and across devices. As long as I have my phone or iPad I have my admission. Thanks for making one thing in my life easy.
Eventbrite I attended a function and it was done on this application and it just works. So I created my own event for a high school reunion. It's well worth it and will keep things organized
Amazing App Festival wise this app is amazing. Can buy tickets to all these festivals, then the tickets are in the app and save to your phone as well. This app is 5 star hands down.
Point and click Haven't encountered any issues yet. Pretty much point and click. Almost too convenient.

Great with Minor Flaws I love it! It's very simple and easy to use. I just wish I could view my tickets in passbook instead of having to go to the seperate app. It seemed like a  waste of space to be but still very uselful.

DRAINS Battery on iPhone5 Used this App w/ passbook & it works great...but because of notifications in Passbook (which don't seem to turn off unless you fully & completely delete the App) battery went from 89% to 17% in less than 2 hours.
Excellent App Really user friendly. I like the ability to just use my phone and not have to worry about printing it out.
Nice and useful Ok to use with surprising functionality (passbook,etc) - "only" 4 stars as buttons are hidden initially with keyboard, which always makes me search for them before I figure it out...
Defaults to "Discover" on open- yuck. 100% of the time I open this app, it is to access a ticket I have purchased. The notion of using
Easy to use It found events near my area and was very easy to register. It also gave me electronic tickets for Passbook app.

An easy way to register Eventbrite is an easy way to purchase tickets, to make reservations, to RSVP and to register for a variety of events. Very versatile, easy and reliable.

Eventbrite App Well, I just discovered it, accidentally I might add, but am already sold on its intent.  Great job Product Manager, Product Owner and Agile Development Team! (Assumption made here on the software development methodology)
A guy Very helpful app takes me seconds to show people my ticket. I also don't have to worry about it being crumpled. Amazing app

Solid App This is a rock-solid app that delivers as promised. A work-horse for the club and entertainment scene benefiting all parties to the ticket transaction with integrity and accuracy, speed, and an excellent user interface. Get it!

Hard to get a refund. I like this app.  Some of The vendors/promoters who use this are questionable. I was unable to use tickets to an event due to over selling the capacity. When I asked for a refund for the tickets I wasn't allowed to use I got the runaround from the promoter and no refund.

Zero stars Every time I try to get the ticket online it doesn't send me the link to view my ticket it sends me to the App Store even though I downloaded the app already and it just keeps doing it over and over. Love this app Easy to find events and purchase tickets.  It is great that Eventbrite interfaces with Passbook so tickets are at your fingertips - no more lost or forgotten paper tickets!!

Love it!! I've used Eventbrite for OVER 3 years now and it meets my needs. I'm able to edit my search options and find exactly what I'm looking for!!!
Quick n easy! Got it done way quick! Much quicker than doing everything online!

When it works it's awesome... I'm having an issue with events not showing up on the app. I'll buy the ticket, receive the email, click the link which opens the app & nothing. No ticket. Strange. When it does work though, it's fantastic.
Eventbrite Works! Very easy to use app. I'm able to register for events and update my calendar quickly, easily, and accurately.

Amazing app Allows me to search for tickets, buy the tickets, scan the tickets then enjoy the show. It's as easy as that.
Good app I like the app to find music events for me and my bf to attend. The booking and paying for tickets is easy. Nobody should ever be clueless again-- get the app, get dress and hit the road!!
Can't Imagine Life Without It!! How can I put into to words how awesome this app is? Anytime we're looking for something to do I turn to this app. It never let's me down!!  I love this app!!

I'm happy with it! Well, I haven't received a waiting status or had a problem yet, but in the meantime, I'm gonna give this a 5. Easy to use!

Great! Never had an issue! Makes keeping track of events I go to a breeze. Not easy to do running three businesses.

No Apple Pay support? What kind of garbage app doesn‚Äôt support Apple Pay in 2020? Apple Pay has been available to third-party developers for years now, and still no support? As a professional iOS developer, I know for a fact that implementing Apple Pay support is really easy, so I can only assume that Eventbrite management is totally clueless. If I have to get up, find my wallet, type in my credit card number, expiration date, security code, address, etc... 9 times out of 10, I‚Äôm just not gonna do it. It just isn‚Äôt worth it. I want to pay with one tap. Plus Apple Pay is significantly more secure than giving yet another company my credit card info. So frustrating.

Many features just don‚Äôt work It‚Äôs nearly impossible to search for events because the filters don‚Äôt work. If I put in a date range of 01/01/20-02/29/20, the search still gives me events happening in December. If I try to just select ‚Äúmusic‚Äù or ‚Äúfood,‚Äù the app tells me there‚Äôs no events at all. The app has potential to be good, but if I can‚Äôt search for what I want, it becomes annoying. Developers please fix the problem.

Eventbrite is great until it‚Äôs time for payout! I had an event that went very well on last Sunday. A small but growing event that I fund-personally (appx 150-200guest) To put together this event I have to hire security, stage hands, set up and breakdown persons, sound, photographers etc. Because I don‚Äôt have a large budget I depend on Eventbrite sales to pay my workers and reimburse me for monies paid out. On the website it states that my payout (after their fees are taken out) would be transferred to my account in 4-5 business days. Based on their quoted time that would mean at the latest I would b paid out Thursday or Friday of that week. That is the same timetable I gave my staff for pay out. When Thursday and Friday came I checked my account it wasn‚Äôt there. I didn‚Äôt get the courtesy of them reaching out in a phone call or email to let me know that they would b paying out my money to me After the time frame I was quoted. Instead I had to call them Only to be told that my money ‚Äòshould‚Äô be paid out to me ‚Äòno later‚Äô then Wednesday of the next week (8 business days)ü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èThis puts me In a Jam bc it makes me look flakey to my hardworking staff and disappoints all of our plans bc of the lie and lack of diligence on Eventbrite‚Äôs end. Then what made it even worse is when I asked to speak to a supervisor I was put on hold for over 30min(No exaggeration) until I decided to hang up and right this review, to WARN others and be heard. If their are any other online ticket companies for events (Ticketmaster, Shopify etc) please let me know... I would rather try another company Instead of being Mislead and Played by Eventbrite Again. By the way it‚Äôs 7days later and I still haven‚Äôt gotten an explanation from a supervisor or the funds from our great event from Eventbrite. Eventbrite gets an ‚ÄúL‚Äù for this one and I‚Äôm not the only one this happens toüò©

Saved me a trip back home! So, I'm still in the camp of "technology isn't where 'they' claim it is."  I still print my tickets and bring them with me. The other night, I was meeting a bunch of people at an event with their tickets. When I arrived at the event, I realized I left the tickets on the table at home. After a mild panic set in, because I was sure that if once you print, you lose the option of using the digital bar code, I loaded the tickets to my phone, just knowing I was going to have to lose my great parking spot and have to go back home to get the printed tickets. Not the case. We were able to get into the event with zero problem. If you are reading this and laughing, you are probably in your 30s or younger. I'm still in the above mentioned camp but it was very reassuring to know I can do this. The app is very simply to use and quite intuitive. Great for people like me who weren't born with a smart phone in my hand. ;)
